title: LTR: misleading error message when loading a model
description:
Loading a model can fail for several reasons when calling the model constructor, but the error message always reports that the Model type does not exist.

https://github.com/apache/lucene-solr/blob/master/solr/contrib/ltr/src/java/org/apache/solr/ltr/model/LTRScoringModel.java#L103
